wikipedia_page.main: Major General Christopher Haslett Elliott  (born 26 May 1947) is a former senior British Army officer who served as Defence Services Secretary from 2001 to 2004.

response: *22 October 1999   -  Major-General Christopher Haslett Elliott CVO CBE
*Brigadier Christopher Haslett Elliott (482177), late The Royal Regiment of Wales.
*Christopher Haslett Elliott (born 1947), British Army officer (South Wales Borderers, Royal Regiment of Wales)
*Christopher Haslett Elliott (born 1947), British Army major general
